track.name: The Things (That) I Used to Do
comments: SeRVing it up SRV style!!!
I just can't get along without you.
The real blues !!! Texas style !!! yeah!!
Froggy Bottom Blues...you can almost here Stevie across the Trinity.
Fantastic guitar work! Move over Jimi Hendrix! There just may be 2 greatest guitar players of all time.
"Thank you so very MUCH!!"  SRV.  He playled guitar like he was ringing a bell.
god bless srv,he will be up there playing blues with the big man.
Dude can play the guitar, just like talking between two good friends.
Makes me weak ........
HAVE MERCY ...... !!!

You have robert johnson, albert king muddy waters all the root of the tree of blues.. SRV is the flowering buds at the end of each branch.... Pure perfection some may come close but never in my lifetime will i see another SRV.... years ahead on the blues scale... My hero
ooohhh yeahhhh.... =)
i love the blues. Stevie freakin rocks
музон для секса! романтика.
kein Alcohol, keine Drogen und nicht rauchen!!!!!Warum denn?
that's right, the things he used to do will never quite be done again...
meravigliosa
How can you improve on perfection?
like steve ;gold gitaar playing
I luv everything he did! xx
